Package adrenaline.model.deck

Class OptionalEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.model.deck.WeaponEffect
      • adrenaline.model.deck.OptionalEffect
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChainEffect
    public class OptionalEffect
extends WeaponEffect
    Extension of WeaponEffect, it creates the optional effects of a weapon

    • Constructor Detail

      • OptionalEffect

        protected OptionalEffect​(WeaponEffectRequirement requirement,
                         java.util.List<TargetType> targets,
                         java.util.List<AtomicWeaponEffect> effects,
                         java.util.List<Ammo> additionalCost,
                         boolean usableBeforeBase,
                         boolean alternativeMode)
        Method to set the optional effects available
        Parameters:
        requirement - is the weapon requirement
        targets - is the list of targets
        effects - is the list of available effects
        additionalCost - is the list of ammo required for the additional effects
        usableBeforeBase - is true if you can use the additional effect before the base effect, false otherwise
        alternativeMode - is true if you can use the additional effect instead of the base effect

        public java.util.List<Ammo> getAdditionalCost()
        Getter method
        Returns:
        the list of additional ammo required

        public boolean isAlternativeMode()
        Method to establish if the effect is alternative
        Returns:
        true if the effect is alternative, false otherwise

      • isUsableBeforeBase

        public boolean isUsableBeforeBase()
        Method to establish if the effect is usable before the base effect
        Returns:
        true if the effect is usable before the base effect, false otherwise

      • isUsable

        public boolean isUsable​(Player attacker)
        Method to establish if an effect is usable: it checks if the player has enough ammo
        Parameters:
        attacker - is the player
        Returns:
        true if he has enough ammo, false otherwise

                      java.lang.Integer... id)
        Method to use an effect
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
